URL

An Artifactory server has been installed in UPM in order to be used for OEG projects. You can access to it from the following URL:
http://aldebaran.dia.fi.upm.es/artifactory
Repositories

Three repositories will be created for project/module.
{module_id}-snapshots-local
--> repository for deploying module snapshots builds
{module_id}-releases-local
--> reposiroty for deploying module releases builds
{module_id}-external-libs-local
--> repository for depoying 3rd party libraries needed by module and that cannot be found in remote Maven repositories. These libraries have to be downloaded from Internet and uploaded to Artifactory manually, using Artifactory UI or
mvn
command.
Access rights

All the people have read access to any repository (anonymous access for reading is allowed).
One user for each project/module will be created.
Users will have permissions to CRUD operations in his repositories.
Maven configuration

You can to configure your Maven settings.xml as follows:
In <servers> tag, if you want to deploy your artifacts, you must include:
<server>
     <id>[project/module_id]-snapshots-deploy-server</id>
     <username>[project/module_user]</username>
     <password>[project/module_user_password]</password>
   </server>
   <server>
     <id>[project/module_id]-releases-deploy-server</id>
     <username>[project/module_user]</username>
     <password>[project/module_user_password]</password>
   </server>
In <mirrors> tag, in order to mirroring Artifactory, you must include:
<mirror>
     <id>mirror</id>
     <mirrorOf>*</mirrorOf>
     <url>
http://aldebaran.dia.fi.upm.es/artifactory/global-repo
</url>
     <name>Artifactory</name>
   </mirror>
You need also configure your module
pom.xml
file as follows:
<project xmlns="
http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0
" xmlns:xsi="
http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance
" xsi:schemaLocation="
http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0
http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd
">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
  <groupId>eu.sealsproject.platform</groupId>
  <artifactId>[your project/module id]</artifactId>
  <version>[your version id]-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <packaging>[package format: jar, war, pom, etc.]</packaging>
  <name>[your project/module name]</name>
  <description>[your project/module description]</description>
 
  <developers>
    <developer>
      <id>[you id]</id>
      <name>[your name]</name>
      <email>[your email]</email>
    </developer>
  </developers>
  
  <scm>
    <connection>[your svn ]</connection>
  </scm>
 
  <properties>
    <global.id>[project id]</global.id>
  </properties>
 
  <dependencies>
    [All dependencies you need]
  </dependencies>
  <distributionManagement>
       <repository>
         <uniqueVersion>false</uniqueVersion>
         <id>${global.id}-releases-deploy-server</id>
         <name>${global.id} releases repository</name>
         <url>
http://aldebaran.dia.fi.upm.es/artifactory/${global.id}-releases-local
</url>
       </repository>
       <snapshotRepository>
         <uniqueVersion>false</uniqueVersion>
         <id>${global.id}-snapshots-deploy-server</id>
         <name>${global.id} snapshots repository</name>
         <url>
http://aldebaran.dia.fi.upm.es/artifactory/${global.id}-snapshots-local
</url>
       </snapshotRepository> 
  </distributionManagement>
</project>
